text: the food was mediocre but the service was lacking my waitresss name was rihanna or something and she was very rude she got our order wrong and didnt seem to care i think she may have spat in my sauce

the asian restaurants noodles were overpriced and not worth the value the garlic flavor was overpowering and the entrees were not that satisfying it may be a better option to dine at a nearby fast food restaurant such as mcdonalds

if you want to find the best deal you can go to zipps or park n fly and spend your money wisely

my recent visit to the mcdonalds at night was a frustrating experience the employees were incredibly rude and didnt seem to care about our satisfaction as customers they made us wait an unreasonable amount of time and were careless with our orders leading to several errors based on my experience i would not recommend this mcdonalds to anyone looking for a good dining experience
